ca.c301.t03_model

Class RecipeDatabaseHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • SQLiteOpenHelper
      • ca.c301.t03_model.RecipeDatabaseHandler

  • public class RecipeDatabaseHandler
extends SQLiteOpenHelper
    Handles the Recipes Database, which are the local recipes

             int oldVersion,

        Parameters:
        db - Is the database to drop and create the table

      • searchRecipes

        public java.util.ArrayList<Recipe> searchRecipes(java.lang.String keyword)
        To search for recipes which have a name that partially matches a given keyword
        Parameters:
        keyword - The keyword to partially match with a recipe name
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of recipes which have names partially matching the given keyword
